sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './CardContent.css' const Cardcontent = () => { return (
CREATE-AND-EARN FROM YOUR ITEMS

The first-ever create-to-earn NFT game in the history of blockchain technology, Yugi: Clash of Pantheons. Pantheons. Pantheons. Pantheons. Pantheons.

This card's name is always treated as "Blue-Eyes White Dragon". Ones per tum you can pay 2000 Life Points to special summon 1 "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" from your deck.

This card's Normal Summon cannot be negated. When Normal Summoned, cards and effects cannot be activated. Neither player can target this card with card effects.

Everytime the opponent summons creature into the field, the point of the player's card is cut by 2000 points. X Stand for the number of the player's cards in hand.

The ltimate wizard : in terms of attack and defense.The ltimate wizard in terms of attack and defense.The ltimate wizard : in terms of attack terms of attack and defense

); } export default Cardcontent;
